hymnsSongs.title: GHS 2 - Come unto me!
content:
1. Hear the blessed Savior calling the oppressed,
Oh, ye heavy-laden, come to Me and rest
Come, no longer tarry, I your load will bear,
Bring Me every burden, bring Me every care.

Refrain:
Come unto Me, I will give you rest
Take My yoke upon you, hear Me and be blest
I am meek and lowly, come and trust My might
Come, My yoke is easy, and My burden’s light.

2. Are you disappointed, wand’ring here and there,
Dragging chains of doubt and loaded down with care?
Do unholy feelings struggle in your breast?
Bring your case to Jesus—He will give you rest.

posts.title: Pavement in Progress!
posts.description: God helping us, our next goal is to pave the surroundings of the church.
